Making Your Business as Attractive as Possible

I often get asked 'What is the best way to attract new customers?'  

My answer is always the same - there's not one magic solution, you need to try a combination of methods, but make sure that you keep on communicating clearly with your prospects.  

  • Read more about Making Your Business as Attractive as Possible

Driving Visitors to Your Website Requires Much More Than Just a Redesign

When it comes to websites, there are two rival schools of thought. The first says content is key. The other says design is more important.  

Well, I say that a good website needs to combine both successfully. You could have great design, but without interesting content it might attract visitors initially, but it's unlikely they'll return.  

  • Read more about Driving Visitors to Your Website Requires Much More Than Just a Redesign

Achieve a Steady Stream of Sales-Ready Leads

I appreciate the irony of talking about drought after the wettest winter we've ever had, but I need to nonetheless.  

Don't worry, I'm not talking about it meteorologically (no need to contemplate hosepipe bans!), but rather sales leads drying up.  

We've recently been working with a client who has some great software with huge potential to expand within their current sector but also into new sectors.  

Face-to-face they have a high success rate of demonstrating how effective their software can be.  

  • Read more about Achieve a Steady Stream of Sales-Ready Leads

Compelling Content will Drive More Leads

You need to communicate some important information, but it's more than a usual marketing e-mail or a blog post.  

You need to prepare a White Paper, a Five Minute Guide, or even a 'Ten Reasons to Trade with Us' type document for your current or prospective clients.  

After all, you know that sometimes a weightier document is needed to add value to your sales and marketing process, and give additional credibility to your business.  

  • Read more about Compelling Content will Drive More Leads

Generate Leads by Connecting with your Target Audience

Somebody once very wisely said, 'it's not what you say, it's the way that you say it'.  

If you've got news to impart - for example, new product launches, current promotions, a recent sponsorship - how do you make sure that you get your message in the right format, to the right people at the right time?  

Fear not - that's where Terry Forsey Consulting can help.  

  • Read more about Generate Leads by Connecting with your Target Audience

Putting Your Business at the Top of Your Prospects Mind

Not everybody has the time or expertise to create compelling, relevant and well written content on a regular basis - that's where we at Terry Forsey Consulting can help.  

For example, monthly marketing e-mails are a great way for businesses to regularly communicate with and nurture their database - inform, educate and promote your products and services.  

In addition, delivering valuable content such as brochures, white papers and guides within these regular updates not only helps to build the relationship, but enhances your credibility as a supplier.  

  • Read more about Putting Your Business at the Top of Your Prospects Mind

Producing Effective Content that's Worth it's Weight in Gold

In modern business, communication is key and getting your message across in a clear, succinct way is vital.  

Blogs and case studies are a great way to do this, but I know that many smaller software businesses don't have the in-house expertise, time or inclination to sit down and write a weekly blog or produce detailed case studies.  

  • Read more about Producing Effective Content that's Worth it's Weight in Gold
